trans-unit.source: A helper class to enable impersonation while serializing the body of the reply message.
trans-unit.target: 要在序列化回覆訊息內容時啟用模擬的協助程式類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the message property.
trans-unit.target: 建立訊息屬性的複本。

trans-unit.source: The copy of the message property.
trans-unit.target: 訊息屬性的複本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the message property.
trans-unit.target: 取得訊息屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the message property.
trans-unit.target: 訊息屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the impersonated context.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，會包含模擬的內容。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會被視為未初始化。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the original principal on the thread before invoking this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，會包含叫用這個方法之前執行緒上的原始主體。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會被視為未初始化。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a value that indicates whether the principal was set on the thread by this method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時會包含值，這個值指出此方法是否已在執行緒上設定主體。

trans-unit.source: This parameter returns <see langword="false" /> if the operation context was not available to impersonate.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會傳回 <see langword="false" />，如果作業內容無法用來模擬。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會被視為未初始化。

trans-unit.source: Starts impersonating with the caller's context if impersonation is enabled on the service and sets the appropriate principal on the thread as per the service configuration.
trans-unit.target: 如果服務已啟動模擬並依照服務組態設定執行緒的適當原則，則啟動模擬呼叫端的內容。

trans-unit.source: The impersonation context to revert.
trans-unit.target: 要還原的模擬內容。

trans-unit.source: The original principal to set on the thread.
trans-unit.target: 要對執行緒設定的原始主體。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the thread principal was set during impersonation.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否已在模擬期間設定執行緒主體的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the principal was set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已設定主體，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Reverts impersonation and sets the specified original principal on the thread.
trans-unit.target: 反向模擬並設定執行緒上的指定原始主體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.ImpersonateOnSerializingReplyMessageProperty" /> property from the specified message or message properties.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的訊息或訊息屬性，取得 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.ImpersonateOnSerializingReplyMessageProperty" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The message from which to extract the property.
trans-unit.target: 要從其中擷取屬性的訊息。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.ImpersonateOnSerializingReplyMessageProperty" /> property extracted from the message.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含擷取自訊息的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.ImpersonateOnSerializingReplyMessageProperty" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.ImpersonateOnSerializingReplyMessageProperty" /> property from the specified message.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的訊息取得 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.ImpersonateOnSerializingReplyMessageProperty" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property was found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到屬性則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The message properties object from which to extract the property.
trans-unit.target: 要從中擷取屬性的訊息屬性物件。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.ImpersonateOnSerializingReplyMessageProperty" /> property extracted from the message.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含擷取自訊息的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.ImpersonateOnSerializingReplyMessageProperty" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.ImpersonateOnSerializingReplyMessageProperty" /> property from the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageProperties" /> object..
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Security.ImpersonateOnSerializingReplyMessageProperty" /> 物件取得 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageProperties" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the property was found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到屬性則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
